segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me which bus I should take to go to the railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'd better take the No . 16 bus . It can take you right there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How often dose this bus go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really can't wait that long . Are there any other buses that can take me there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The No . 2 bus also goes to the railway station . You may take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where can I find the bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The bus stop is not far from here . Go straight on and you can easily find it .
segments.speaker: S2
